about_the_game: Circus Elephant Demo is a 3d platformer, where you play as an elephant in a circus. You need to control a ball that the elephant rides. The circus has a lot of obstacles that the elephant needs to pass, this elephant was captured from a forest by humans, and your main objective is to pass all obstacles to reach the end of each level, this game is a physics-based platformer momentum of the ball is crucial here. You can use a keyboard or controller to control the ball which moves according to the laws of physics, This is a demo of Circus Elephant which has only 5 levels.
detailed_description: Circus Elephant Demo is a 3d platformer, where you play as an elephant in a circus. You need to control a ball that the elephant rides. The circus has a lot of obstacles that the elephant needs to pass, this elephant was captured from a forest by humans, and your main objective is to pass all obstacles to reach the end of each level, this game is a physics-based platformer momentum of the ball is crucial here. You can use a keyboard or controller to control the ball which moves according to the laws of physics, This is a demo of Circus Elephant which has only 5 levels.
name: Circus Elephant Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
